resources.string: Smart Care Application is a health care monitoring application that uses IoT monitoring devices to monitor patient health status and as well as the room condition. This application tends to lessen the burden of medical practitioners upon monitoring their patient time by time without having to go directly to the patient room and monitor them, just simply looking unto the application they can able to monitor patient and room status real-time.

The developers of this application is a student from Notre Dame of Marbel University in compliance for their capstone thesis projects. Namely they are Marlou C. Antenero, Mea Gwen B. Gulle, and James Lloyd G. Teker taking a course of Bachelor of Science in Information Technology.
